DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness TGR-1202 combination brentuximab vedotin patient hodgkin 's lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: Novel PI3K Delta Inhibitor TGR-1202 , Combination With Brentuximab Vedotin Hodgkin 's Lymphoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis Hodgkin 's Lymphoma Relapsed refractory autologous stem cell transplant ( ASCT ) least two prior multiagent chemotherapy regimens patient candidate ASCT Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) score 0 2 Any major surgery , chemotherapy immunotherapy within last 21 day Known hepatitis B virus , hepatitis C virus HIV infection Autologous hematologic stem cell transplant within 3 month study entry . Patients prior Allogeneic hematologic stem cell transplant exclude
